attributes.action: Ban gambling advertising on football grounds
attributes.additional_details:
Gambling  Ruined people's lifes 
I believe if we could cut gambling advertising so is not on your face  all the time, 
Macdonalds advertising is ban on  Certain times
I believe gambling is more dangerous and life  Threat'ning
attributes.background: I would like the government to do more on gambling advertising so young people don't see it all the time!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Ban the advertisement of gambling websites and apps
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557212

Ban gambling advertisements on television and radio.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548310
